body:
Test 1

  1. This is a test

Modernizr tests for the following features:

  • @font-face
  • Canvas
  • Canvas Text
  • HTML5 Audio
  • HTML5 Video
  • rgba()
  • hsla()
  • border-image:
  • border-radius:
  • box-shadow:
  • text-shadow:
  • opacity:
  • Multiple backgrounds
  • Flexible Box Model
  • CSS Animations
  • CSS Columns
  • CSS Gradients
  • CSS Reflections
  • CSS 2D Transforms
  • CSS 3D Transforms
  • CSS Transitions
  • Geolocation API
  • localStorage
  • sessionStorage
  • SVG
  • SMIL
  • SVG Clipping
  • Inline SVG
  • Drag and Drop
  • hashchange
  • X-window Messaging
  • History Management
  • applicationCache
  • Touch events
  • Web Sockets
  • Web Workers
  • Web SQL Database
  • WebGL
  • IndexedDB
  • Input Types†
  • Input Attributes‡
styles:
<style>
 [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .fontface li.fontface:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .audio li.audio:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .video li.video:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .geolocation li.geolocation:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .canvas li.canvas:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .canvastext li.canvastext:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .rgba li.rgba:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .hsla li.hsla:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .multiplebgs li.multiplebgs:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .borderimage li.borderimage:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .borderradius li.borderradius:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .boxshadow li.boxshadow:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .opacity li.opacity:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .cssanimations li.cssanimations:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .csscolumns li.csscolumns:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .cssgradients li.cssgradients:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .cssreflections li.cssreflections:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .csstransforms li.csstransforms:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .csstransforms3d li.csstransforms3d:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .csstransitions li.csstransitions:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .localstorage li.localstorage:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .sessionstorage li.sessionstorage:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .webworkers li.webworkers:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .applicationcache li.applicationcache:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .svg li.svg:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .smil li.smil:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .svgclippaths li.svgclippaths:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .hashchange li.hashchange:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .websqldatabase li.websqldatabase:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .indexeddb li.indexeddb:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .websockets li.websockets:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .draganddrop li.draganddrop:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .history li.history:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .postmessage li.postmessage:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .inlinesvg li.inlinesvg:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .webgl li.webgl:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .touch li.touch:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .flexbox li.flexbox:after,        [data-stylesheets~="2_id"] .textshadow li.textshadow:after    {   color: #8cee23;        content: ' ✓'; }    </style>
<style>
 [data-stylesheets~="3_id"] img {max-width: 100%;}
 </style>
